attributes.action: Legislate every local authority keep an online Municiple Database of residents, property owners & visitors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The online Municipal database will afford access to the address of named individuals, directly tackling ID theft. Enhancing the Electoral Register & integrating with the DVLA/DMV, National DNA, bank & other databases fraud will be reduced by cross-checking finance applications. Linking property owners to addresses is necessary to identify money-laundering [e.g., drugs] & seizure. Hotels registering visitors necessary to assist in crime-prevention [e.g., fingerprint & other ID required on key hand-over].
